action_details: Given the high severity of the incident and the presence of injured individuals, we will allocate a team of 5 doctors to respond effectively. Our team will consist of 2 primary care physicians, 1 specialist in emergency medicine, and 2 general practitioners who can provide initial stabilization and triage services if needed. Upon arrival at the scene on Av. Campo del Sur, 262, Cadiz, Spain, our team will conduct a thorough assessment of the injured individuals, prioritize their treatment based on the severity of their injuries, and stabilize them for potential transport to the nearby hospital. If we cannot confirm the capacity of the nearby hospital, our team will be prepared to provide ongoing care at the scene until further assistance arrives.
